verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Welcome, welcome all of you
I'm glad you're with us
Shake hands never to be blue
Welcome to you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There's a welcome here
There's a welcome here
There's a Christian welcome here
Hallelujah.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's a welcome here
There's a welcome here
There's a Christian welcome here.
